Package gameClient

Class AutoGameGenerator

java.lang.Object
gameClient.AutoGameGenerator
public abstract class AutoGameGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
The Abstract Class AutoGameGenerator.this is the tool that manages the automatic game in MyGameGui. it moves the the robots systematically by processing the information about the robot's speed, the fruit's value and the distance of the robot from the fruit-and deciding which robot should reach each fruit. in addition , this class adds the robots to the best node in the graph to start Which will give a good yield of points for the beginning of the game.

  • Method Details

    • AutoMove

      public static void AutoMove​(Server.game_service game, dataStructure.DGraph graph, java.util.List<gameClient.Robot> robots, java.util.List<gameClient.Fruit> fruits)
      Auto move of the game. the first step of the auto move is to copy the losts of the robots and the fruits to new lists. after this, a loop go over those lists and finds which fruit is the most valuable, which edge this fruit on and from whcih node should a robot come and get it from. the function search for the closest robot to reach this node and after this updates this robot's dest in the game server the loop ends when there are no more fruits or robots in lists
      Parameters:
      game - the game
      graph - the graph
      robots - the robots
      fruits - the fruits

    • AddRobots

      public static void AddRobots​(Server.game_service game, dataStructure.DGraph Graph, int RobotsNum, java.util.List<gameClient.Fruit> fruits)
      Adds the robots to the best place. The robots add to the nodes that before the fruits, so that when the game starts they will eat those fruits.
      Parameters:
      game - the game
      Graph - the graph
      RobotsNum - the robots num
      fruits - the fruits
